sentences.en: It will lead to devaluation of a number of currencies.
sentences.cn: 这将导致多种货币的贬值。

sentences.en: Devaluation would only give the economy a brief respite.
sentences.cn: 货币贬值只会给经济一个短时间的暂缓。

sentences.en: There has been a further small devaluation against the dollar.
sentences.cn: 兑美元的比值继续小幅下跌。
